p: Heparinised peripheral blood samples were obtained from healthy donors, who were non-smoking, nonalcoholic and not under any medications; not exposed to any mutagens. Informed consent was obtained from each donor. For lymphocyte culture, 0.5 mL blood sample was added to sterile culture vial containing 5 mL of RPMI-1640 medium supplemented with 1.0 mL of fetal calf serum (15%) and 0.1 mL of phytohemagglutinin-P. The culture vials were tightly corked and incubated at 37Â°C for 24 h.
